utils package¶

Submodules¶

utils.io module¶

This module contains helper functions for reading/writing netCDF files

utils.io.walktree(top)[source]¶

The function walktree is a Python generator that is used to walk the directory tree

Returns

All children groups within a netCDF file

Return type

Python array

utils.plot module¶

This module contains helper functions for plotting the dataset. The features include: scatter plot 3D, time series plot, and DART QC plot.

utils.plot.geo_3d_plot(dataset, variable)[source]¶

Display 3D scatter plot of a variable within a specific group in a dataset

utils.plot.qc_observations_plot(dataset)[source]¶

Display count of observation corresponding to each qc value

Parameters

dataset (xarray.Dataset) – Dataset returned from main.get_dataset_subset()

utils.plot.time_series_qc_plot(dataset)[source]¶

Display time series of quality control

Module contents¶

This module contains all helper functions functions for DART Viewer GUI
